sub_title: Senior Key Account Manager - Chains & Key Accounts at Just Eat Takeaway.com
summary:
Experienced Key Account Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the E-commerce industry and start-up environment. 
A strong track record of establishing and implementing (global) partnerships (affiliates & corporates) in an international environment.
Knowledge of the travel and E-commerce industry and a good business network in the Benelux and Nordic market with a strong ambition to keep expanding this network.

I describe myself as results oriented and a relationship builder. Creative, persistent and an outgoing personality, eager to learn. Proactive, positive and self-motivated. 
Quick and resourceful, team-player, flexible, accurate, strong analytical skills and an eye for detail. And next to that excellent communication, negotiation and reporting skills. 
It motivates me when there is an ability to be creative, take initiatives in an innovative environment.

profile_positions.description:
- Representing over 60 Fletcher Hotels spread through The Netherlands
- Responsible for the corporate sales and pre opening of Fletcher Hotel Amsterdam**** (January 2013) 
- Managing corporate accounts; business development, new business, client management and retention
- Corporate contracting and negotiation
- Building new relations and existing relationship management
- Started handling RFP's and guest requests
- All activities to improve yearly growth of client portfolio and annual results
- Implementation of new build properties, acquired properties and local hotel integration
- Marketing and sales activities to improve hotel revenue and results
- Training new interns

In this sales role the aim was to increase the commercial results through acquisition and relationship management. 
I was responsible for increasing the utilization rates / sales, development activities and to build long lasting business relationships. I collected leads and access them. Also I delivered an active contribution to build new sales channels and the development of new product / market combinations.

This 4 star hotel with its world renowned look is situated next to the Zaandam train station, where the train will take you to the centre of Amsterdam within 12 minutes. Also, the RAI Congress Centre and Schiphol Airport are easy to reach by train. Inntel Hotels Amsterdam Zaandam has 160 unique hotel rooms, a Wellness Club, free wifi internet and it's own Tourist Information Office.
profile_positions.title: Front Office Assistant

company.name: Legian Beach Hotel and Candi Beach Cottage - Bali Indonesia, 4 star resort

profile_positions.company: Legian Beach Hotel and Candi Beach Cottage - Bali Indonesia, 4 star resort
profile_positions.description:
In the Balinese language, the word 'Legian' means anything sweet, pleasant, and delightful to the senses. So will be your experience at Legian Beach Hotel, where our friendly staff will do everything they can to ensure that your holiday is not only delightful, but also very special and memorable.
 
Located at absolute beachfront, with a wide range of facilities and leisure options, Legian Beach Hotel embraces families, couples, honeymooners and business travelers. 
The 118 single-storey cottages and 100 guest rooms, including 23 family rooms and 5 rooms that cater for disabled travelers, are set amid a landscaped tropical oasis dotted with coconut palms, shady trees, and sweet-scented flowers. 
The traditional architecture utilizes local materials from Bali and neighboring Indonesian islands, red tiled roofs merged with romantic alang alang thatch, while breezy, lazy gazebos melt into the natural beauty. 
The vista of the dramatic coastline and the rolling surf is spectacular, while the fiery sunsets viewed from here are the best in Bali.

profile_positions.description:
Departments: Guest Relations, Spa Wellness, Reservations, F&B (Pool Bar and Lounge) and Front Office. 
The IBEROSTAR Mirabello Beach & Village is an All-Inclusive 5-star hotel right on Mirabello beach. This impeccable resort on the Aegean Sea with elegant facilities and professional service is the ideal choice for those wanting to spend a luxurious holiday in Greece, either as a family or a couple. It's surroundings and landscape that can be seen from the rooms, terraces and swimming pools are spectacular. 
Furthermore, it is only a few miles from the center of the town of Agios Nikolaos, which has a lively nightlife.

Recommendation Crete, October 2007

Jozefien is an enthusiastic and talented person. During the time that she was working as a Guest Relations trainee she became knowledgeable of all island information and she was able to answer any guest questions as well as all general information concerning the hotel's operation. Jozefien was also able to accommodate, answer, and recommend guest inquiries. The additional language that she speaks was a definite asset for this position. She was assisting me in a lot of aspects pertaining to the Guest Relations Department. Jozefien also provided a high profile of quality guest services. She was capable of handling some simple complaints and problems to the guest's satisfaction. Her duties and responsibilities also included sales of treatments of the wellness spa. She always communicated with me in advance if the needed to complete specific program tasks. She has outstanding interpersonal skills that made her job run very smoothly. Jozefien would be a wonderful addition to any work environment. I wish her all the best for her future career at the hospitality industry!

Vicky Maltabe
Guest Relations Manager
